name: workshop2017.github.io
body:
### ANITA 2017 workshop and astroinformatics school.
The ANITA annual workshop aimsÂ to provide a review of theoretical astrophysics in Australia, facilitate collaboration and build the community of theoretical astrophysicists.

The workshop is open to everyone, membership to ANITA is not required (though encouraged).

### ANITA Workshop 2017
The 2017 ANITA workshop will be held 9th-10th February at the University of Tasmania in Hobart, Tasmania

### Astroinformatics school
The 2017 astroinformatics school will run 6th-8th February at the same location

### Organising committee
LOC: Stas Shabala, Daniel Price
SOC: ANITA steering committee
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
